channel.title: Lost Legacy - Updated: January 21 2013!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/f1ijp.png[/img] Lost Legacy may be looked upon as a ordinary server, however this is far from the actual truth. Unlike many other servers, Lost Legacy is a created for the players. We strive for creating the 'Perfect' server. Our main priority and concern is our players, which is why we're always open to suggestions to improve our game play. Our friendly and helpful staff will always be there to assist you throughout your journey on Lost Legacy. Lost Legacy is not just a 'game' but in fact, it's a where players can come to relax and truly enjoy themselves. We try our absolute best upon providing a fun and safe game playing experience for our players. We're strong, we're confident. We are Lost Legacy. [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/dme49j.png[/img] A few months ago I started the original Lost Legacy. However shortly after my computer crashed and it would not work. Coincidentally when that happened I had a series of personal events that occurred which did not quite let me repair my computer. Finally, after some time my computer was repaired. Unfortunately, I lost everything that was on it. I tried to get in to communicate with my old partners and as soon as I did they wanted to start a project. So here I am, officially starting up Lost Legacy. Hope you enjoy what you see! The Base we are using: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=457959.0]MTP V2[/url] [b][u]Developers:[/u][/b] Me - Server/Client [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/reader/"]Reader[/URL] - Server/Forums Forums: Online since 21-12-2012: [url=http://www.lost-legacy.nl/]Lost Legacy[/url] Media: More Coming Soon! *Full Chaotic + PvP Armor Degrading *Sexy Fullscreen *Sexy Gameframe *All Nex Armours With Effect *Curses 100% *Quick Prayers *Skillng Zone *New Runescape Hitsplats *All Dupes Fixed *Many Pk Locations item.title: Lost Legacy - Updated: January 21 2013!
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Well, any server can feel perfect if you put forth some time and effort, which most do not. I hope you achieve most, if not all, of your goals. As of right now, you seem motivated which is great, but in order to ‘raise’ the server to your standards (I sense you have high standards) you must have patience and support. The support part shouldn’t be too hard, seeing as you’re making great progress server-wise and everything looks fantastic. As for the patience, I have no clue; I’d have to personally get to know you.

If you’re thinking of implementing unique content, I’d suggest you take a look at Team_Rocket’s concept(s) threads under the General Server Discussion Section. You will be surprised, that man comes up with some beautifully unique ideas.

Read full topic

item.title: Lost Legacy - Updated: January 21 2013!
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

Clawz fury:

This looks so loveing cool

Thanks (:

[quote=“Fails, post:3, topic:476021”]Oh my god, it’s Infection! You might not remember me, but oh well.

On to the actual topic;

We strive for creating the ‘Perfect’ server.

I’m not ‘ragging’ on you, but I’ve seen this quote countless times and quite frankly, I’m tired of it. Everybody ‘strives’ for the perfect server, but in reality they lack the support, knowledge, and motivation it takes in order to complete such an ‘impossible’ task. Note how I put quotes around impossible.

I do like your slogan though. ‘We are strong, we are confident, we are Lost Legacy.’

The best I can do for you is wish you the best of luck. I have seen your previous works and was moderately impressed, you have my support. <3
[/quote]

Ah sorry I don’t remember you been a while since I was on these forums. Yes I do agree, it has been used countless times. However, I believe in achieving my goals. My goal for this server is to make it “feel” like the perfect server for players. If you can understand. And thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Lost Legacy - Updated: January 21 2013!
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Oh my god, it’s Infection! You might not remember me, but oh well.

On to the actual topic;

We strive for creating the ‘Perfect’ server.

I’m not ‘ragging’ on you, but I’ve seen this quote countless times and quite frankly, I’m tired of it. Everybody ‘strives’ for the perfect server, but in reality they lack the support, knowledge, and motivation it takes in order to complete such an ‘impossible’ task. Note how I put quotes around impossible.

I do like your slogan though. ‘We are strong, we are confident, we are Lost Legacy.’

The best I can do for you is wish you the best of luck. I have seen your previous works and was moderately impressed, you have my support. <3

Read full topic

item.title: Lost Legacy - Updated: January 21 2013!
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

[CENTER]

f1ijp.png700×150

Lost Legacy may be looked upon as a ordinary server, however this is far from the actual truth. Unlike many other servers, Lost Legacy is a created for the players. We strive for creating the ‘Perfect’ server.
Our main priority and concern is our players, which is why we’re always open to suggestions to improve our game play. Our friendly and helpful staff will always be there to assist you throughout your journey on Lost Legacy.
Lost Legacy is not just a ‘game’ but in fact, it’s a where players can come to relax and truly enjoy themselves. We try our absolute best upon providing a fun and safe game playing experience for our players.
We’re strong, we’re confident.
We are Lost Legacy.

A few months ago I started the original Lost Legacy. However shortly after my computer crashed and it would not work. Coincidentally when that happened I had a series of personal events that occurred which did not quite let me repair my computer. Finally, after some time my computer was repaired. Unfortunately, I lost everything that was on it. I tried to get in to communicate with my old partners and as soon as I did they wanted to start a project. So here I am, officially starting up Lost Legacy. Hope you enjoy what you see!

The Base we are using:
MTP V2

Developers:

Me - Server/Client
Reader - Server/Forums

Forums:

Online since 21-12-2012: Lost Legacy

Media:
More Coming Soon!

-Added Highscores - Have To Rewrite The Styles To Fit With The Forum Colors/Looks.
